scripts.build:android: npx expo prebuild --clean && EAS_LOCAL_BUILD_SKIP_CLEANUP=1 EAS_LOCAL_BUILD_WORKINGDIR=/tmp/expo/ eas build --platform android --local --clear-cache
scripts.build:ios: npx expo prebuild --clean && EAS_LOCAL_BUILD_SKIP_CLEANUP=1 EAS_LOCAL_BUILD_WORKINGDIR=/tmp/expo/ eas build --platform ios --local --clear-cache
